price: Dialah Allah, tidak ada tuhan selain Dia. Mengetahui yang gaib dan yang nyata, Dialah Yang Maha Pengasih, Maha Penyayang.
arabic: هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ عَٰلِمُ ٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَٱلشَّهَٰدَةِۖ هُوَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: huwa al-lahu alladhī lā ilāha illā huwa ʿālimu al-ghaybi wal-shahādati huwa al-raḥmānu al-raḥīmu
